name: Date Us, You Won't!
description:
★ IMPORTANT:

THIS PROJECT IS FINISHED! But, be aware that we will be updating it in the future.

Two of our characters still do not have voice acting and we hope to remedy that soon. Keep an eye on our devlog for updates!

--

You're at the University's annual festival and somehow got dragged into participating in a dating booth. Since you're here now, might as well go for the ride, right?

Join our wacky OCs for silly jokes and simple chit-chat in

Date Us, You Won't !

--

This game is meant to be a small interactive experience for you and these characters. There is no big arching story, just a conversation between two people who have just met!

Warning as Game contains:

  • Cursing
  • Loud sudden sounds
  • Conversations that may destroy brain cells

Game Features:

  • 3 endings per main character
  • 3 secret characters to unlock
  • 2 endings per secret character (except one that has 3 endings?!)
  • Around 15 minutes of game time per main character route
  • Around 7 minutes of game time per secret character route

★ All characters in this game are over the age of 21.

--

Learn a bit about the characters before you make a decision:

So, who will you choose to date first?

--

Known bugs that appear in-game:

  • Bio page becomes unresponsive at times
  • Credits page becomes unresponsive at times
  • Credit link page becomes unresponsive at times
  • After choosing the first option in Asana's route, the game sometimes stops

★ If the bugs appear, please restart the game!

--

Dev Note: 

This is an extremely close and dear project to the two of us. We've been discussing this project for around 4 to 5 years and it's so exciting that we have finally finished it!

We really hope you enjoyed playing it as much as we enjoyed making it. ♥

★ Read more about our OCs here - https://refsheet.net/WildWildnt
